articles.description: Bharti Airtel said that it will shutdown down its copper infrastructure in a year's time and will just offer Fiber-to-the Home in the country.
articles.content: NEW DELHI: Bharti Airtel said that it will shutdown down its copper infrastructure in a year's time and will just offer Fiber-to-the Home in the country. It is also aiming to offer broadband through … [+3015 chars]

articles.author: Aditya Nadkarni
articles.title: New Mahindra Thar recalled; more than 1,500 units affected - CarWale
articles.description: 1,577 units of the Mahindra Thar recalled. The recall is limited only to the diesel variants of the SUV.
articles.content:
- 1,577 units of the Mahindra Thar recalled
- The recall is limited only to the diesel variants of the SUV
Mahindra has announced a recall to inspect and replace the camshaft in the second-generati… [+727 chars]
